section.name: CEA Implementation in Astrogrid
section.p: The Astrogrid projects that implement parts of this architecture are

ul.li: Applications Integration This implements the core CEA functionality
Workflow objects which contains the schema and wsdl definitions
Job Management System This does not strictly implement part of the CEA, but does act as the component that invokes the CEA within AstroGrid

section.p: Currently there is implemented a specialization of the CommonExectutionController for unix command line applications that is called the CommandLineApplicationController.
